import React from 'react' import imgAvatar from '../images/avatars/image-amyrobson.png' import imgReply from '../images/icon-reply.svg' import imgDelete from '../images/icon-delete.svg' import data from '../data.json' export default function Card() { const currentUser = data.currentUser.username; const createdAt = data.comments[0].createdAt; const comment = data.comments[0].content; return (

{currentUser}

{createdAt}

{comment}

+ 1 -

Reply
) }
